pages.name: Dark Necrom Yellow Damashii
pages.text: Accessed with the $(l:ghost/items/ghost_eyecons#dark_necrom_yellow_ghost_eyecon)Dark Necrom Ghost Eyecon (Yellow)$(/l)

pages.title: Kamen Rider Dark Necrom Yellow
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Ghost: The 100 Eyecons and Ghost's Fateful Moment (2016, movie)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:ghost/devices/proto_mega_ulorder#proto_mega_ulorder_yellow)Proto Mega Ulorder$(/l)$(br2)This form can be used by any Ghost Driver or Mega Ulorder user$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Speed II$(li)Resistance$(li)Strength II

pages.title: Kamen Rider Dark Necrom Yellow
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Ghost: The 100 Eyecons and Ghost's Fateful Moment (2016, movie)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:ghost/devices/proto_mega_ulorder#proto_mega_ulorder_yellow)Proto Mega Ulorder$(/l)$(br2)This form can be used by any Ghost Driver or Mega Ulorder user$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Speed II$(li)Resistance$(li)Night Vision$(li)Jump Boost$(li)Strength II
